Key Match Events: Jacob Stallings' RBI double in the ninth inning helped the Colorado Rockies beat the Detroit Tigers 4-2.
J. Beck homered to left center (417 feet) in the 3rd inning.
S. Halvorsen pitched a 1.0 IP, 0 H, 0 ER, 1 K, 0 BB shutout in the 9th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Colorado Rockies beat the Detroit Tigers 4-2 on Thursday.
The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan, with an attendance of 19,538.
